description.value: Each time you hit a creature with an attack using your @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.spells-cantrips.QVIXYJFEAOXHF2SW]{Dread Blade}, you can spend 1 mana to attempt to instill fear in it. The creature must succeed on a Wisdom (Save) Check versus your spell save DC or become @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.UK95BQ45TGSD5Q3V]{Frightened} of you until the end of its next turn. A creature that succeeds on its save is immune to this ability until the start of your next turn.

system.requirements: 3rd level overall and have at least one level each in a Martial and Spellcaster class
